body: For those wondering who’s who, let’s say Marin is (arthas from Warcraft) and the guy is (nerzhul). Nerzhul tried to take over arthas’s body but arthas manage to take over and won. However in this doujin, the personality of the guy manages to absorb and become “twisted”. Like Marin is in control of her body but the personality and the memory of the guy is absorb by her.

This is a new level of cruel. I mean imagine if it were the opposite gender, a cruel jock and a screwy nerd. And the jock who used to just bully the nerd, now starts to rape him. That's what happened, but that is the beauty of date. His comics often have a dark twist.
